ai-patthana15.77:0.2_0: The Order of the Dhamma: allows unintelligent in the Khadehaka, that is to say, the Lord of the Death,
ai-patthana15.77:0.3_0: Seeing that they will be able to see the truth.
ai-patthana15.77:1.1_0: Gathering should be given up by seeing, not seeing, inclining, you should give up causes and reasons.
ai-patthana15.77:2.1_0: The teaching doesn’t give up attention to developing and cultivating the base for developing the principles. The reason for developing the recollection of development should be given up.
ai-patthana15.77:3.1_0: You shouldn’t give up necessary condition for seeing or meetings with reasons. You should not give up a cause or reason for developing and cultivating the reason for developing the recollection of development.
